message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the income statement, I can see there is a line item explicitly called "Depreciation" with a value of 96479.34. This is exactly what I'm looking for, as depreciation represents the allocation of an asset's cost over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '96479.34'} }
```
